<template>
  <checkBoxSelect @spellSearch="updateSearch" />
  <spellTable :spellData="spellSearch" />
</template>

<script>
import spellTable from "./components/formTable.vue";
import checkBoxSelect from "./components/formCheckBoxSelect.vue";

export default {
  name: "ongletRecherche",
  props: ["spellData"],
  components: {
    spellTable,
    checkBoxSelect,
  },

  cumputed: {
    spellSearch() {
      console.log("test");
      console.log(this.searchNameBox);
      console.log(this.searchName);

      if (this.searchNameBox)
        return data.filter((spell) => spell[1].startsWith(this.searchName));
      else return [];
    },
  },
  methods: {
    updateSearch(
      searchName,
      searchNameBox,
      searchSchool,
      searchSchoolBox,
      searchBranche,
      searchBrancheBox,
      searchClasse,
      searchClasseBox,
      searchLevel,
      searchLevelBox
    ) {
      this.searchName = searchName;
      this.searchNameBox = searchNameBox;
      this.searchSchool = searchSchool;
      this.searchSchoolBox = searchSchoolBox;
      this.searchBranche = searchBranche;
      this.searchBrancheBox = searchBrancheBox;
      this.searchClasse = searchClasse;
      this.searchClasseBox = searchClasseBox;
      this.searchLevel = searchLevel;
      this.searchLevelBox = searchLevelBox;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.spellTab:hover {
  color: white;
  background-color: #791cf8;
}
</style>
